slide_content_0: CapCut is a video recording and editing application, especially for you to record TikTok videos according to the current trend, such as Tik Tok video wipe the transforming mirror. Viamaker or CapCut offers you a lot of effects for video recording as well as video editing at your disposal. CapCut's interface is also very simple, easy to use. You can edit a video, or apply it to the whole video. This guide will guide you how to use CapCut to shoot and edit a professional videos or clips.
slide_title_1: #1: How to Edit Videos with CapCut
slide_content_1:
At the interface of the application we click New Project to select the video you want to edit from an existing album. Click on the video to adjust and then select Add to Project below.

This is the video editing interface on Viamaker. If you want to join the video , click the plus icon to add. If you want to return to the operation , click on the 2 arrow heads icon .

Click Edit to edit the video. In the editing interface, below are all video editing tools. To cut a video into two or three segments, first drag the white vertical bar to the position you want to split , then press Split . A video can be cut into several different segments.


To adjust the video speed click on Speed , click Normal . Then adjust the speed for slow or fast video through the speed bar to your liking.


Volume to adjust the sound level in videos . Animation will create video display effect (In), end video (Out) or both (Combo) . We choose the duration to apply the effect at the Duration bar .

Part Transform to flip, crop, rotate or resize the frame for video.
slide_content_2: - CapCut offer the massive Filters for your video.It can make your video unique and beautiful. - Opacity adjusts the blur for the video. - Beauty to adjust the face for you. - Add some freeze frame to your video - Voice effects to change the voice in video in many different tones. - Reverse to rewind the video. - You can edit the speed of video clips with a surprising amount of control. - PIP: you can add element from your phone or pad to your video. - Canvas: it just like the background and you can own one perfect canvas cloth for your video.
slide_title_3: #3: Insert Text & Stickers to Your Clip!
slide_content_3:
To add Text to your clip.
Click Text to insert text into the video with many different styles and effects. The text will appear in a separate bar, then you can adjust the position., and how long it lasts.
Also there are so many effects for your text.Style,Effects,Bubble,Animation.
You can choose the text color,text font,text background,shadow,Word space Align.
Sticker adds the icons that the application provides or you choose the sticker in the album. PiP to insert images into videos. Effects to add effects to videos and you can also choose the time for display effects. The Format for Adjusting Video to Adjust also adds lighting to the whole video.
slide_content_4: When you have finished editing the video, you return to the original interface of the application. Click on Audio to add music to the video with Sound as an existing sound, Effects is some other sounds like laughter, applause . Extract to add music in the album and Voiceover to record your own sound.
slide_content_5:
It is same functions as “edit–Transform–Crop”.It have Free 9:16,3:4,1:1,4:3,16:9 size.
If you make TikTok videos, you should have videos 9:16, make YouTube videos, choose 16: 9.

After editing is complete, click the export icon above to export the video is finished.
slide_content_6:
for Android System Phone:
Open Google Play Store
Search the “CapCut”
GET IT
After installed viamaker,Open it
You will view “New Project”
Click the “+”,and click “add to project”,you can add your photo or video from your phones to CapCut
There are so many Element for your video,you can choose it as your love.
we will explain the effection about each Element in next sections
After Done,you can export the video in your phone
you can view it on the CapCut “Projects”
slide_content_7:
CqpCut is a free all-in-one video editing app that helps you create incredible videos. Cut, reverse and change speed: getting it just right is easier than ever, Posting only your wonderful moments.
Advanced filters and flawless beauty effects open up a world of possibilities
Massive music library, Exclusive TikTok song.
